Introduction

Song Yu Vin is a South Korean Singer and Actor under Musicworks Entertainment. He is currently the Main Vocalist of the boy group Myteen.
In 2019, Yuvin participated in the hit survival show Produce X 101 where he ranked #15 on the final episode. Despite not being able to debut as part of X1, Yuvin recieved immense love and support from viewers.

He debuted as a soloist on May 30, 2016 with the single "You Are The Only One".
